column2: "I suppose I could give it another shot myself, but, well..."
"I'll just hand this over to you rather than pointlessly trying to show off my lack of skills. You'll do me proud, right?"
"You're really excellent, so you're fine no matter the opponent, right? Just wrap it up real quick like!"
"I'm counting on you! I'll be checking the whole thing out on the monitor, and with a big ol' smile on my face! Go get 'em!"
